00008                 File(path, MAVEN_IO_FILE_READ);

00011         File::File(maven::String* path, mint mode) {
00012                 super("maven.File");
00013                 catchNilObjectException(path, return);
00014                 catchNilObjectException(mode, return);
00015                 
00016                 f = new std::fstream();
00017                 if(mode == MAVEN_IO_FILE_READ) {
00018                         f->open(path->s, std::fstream::in);
00019                         return;
00020                 }
00021                 if(mode == MAVEN_IO_FILE_WRITE) {
00022                         f->open(path->s, std::fstream::out);
00023                         return;
00024                 }
00025         }

00028                 return f->is_open();

00032                 f->close();

00039         maven::String* File::readLine() {
00040                 if(!f->is_open())
00041                         return new maven::String("");
00042                 
00043                 std::string line = "";
00044                 mbyte c;
00045                 while(!f->eof()) {
00046                         c = f->get();
00047                         if(c == '\n') break;
00048                         line += c;
00049                 }
00050                 return new maven::String(line.c_str());
00051         }

00053         mboolean File::readBoolean() {
00054                 return f->get() != 0;
00055         }

00058                 return f->get();

00061         maven::Data* File::readData() {
00062                 maven::Data* data = new maven::Data();
00063                 f->read((char*) &data->size, sizeof(data->size));
00064                 char buffer[MAVEN_DATA_CHUNKSIZE];
00065                 f->read((char*) buffer, data->size);
00066                 
00067                 // move to Data
00068                 data->allocateBytes(data->size);
00069                 data->write((char*) buffer, data->size);
00070                 
00071                 return data;
00072         }

00117                 if(data == NULL) return false;
00118                 f->write((const char*) &data->size, sizeof(data->size));
00119                 return f->write((const char*) data->tail->chunk, data->size);

00158         mboolean File::writeLine(maven::String* line) {
00159                 if(!f->is_open()) return false;
00160                 f->write(line->s, line->len);
00161                 f->write("\n", 1);
00162                 return true;
